page.title: 17THE BOMBHOLE
page.content:
The bombhole is about 40 years old.It is about 20metres by 45metres.If you sieve through the earth and are lucky, one can sometimes find bits of a Spitfire that was shot down while it was defending Britain in the Second World War.I have seen a bit of the wing of the plane. It crashed after being involved in a dog_fight with a German bomber. For some strange reason people are always setting the hole on fire. Because of its name people think that it will blow up if they set fire to it. They normally get chased away by the farmer who owns the land. He does not like people in his fields.
By Stephen McMullan
